reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2014, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this place this past weekend and it was fabulous. The rooms are not fancy at all but if you go to Parguera is not for staying in the room; so, the fanciness of the rooms it's not that relevant. My only complaint is that the walls seem to be too thin; so, you can hear practically anything happening in the rooms next to yours. But in general, people were very quiet.
reviews.title: Quaint beachfront inn
Stay away from the restaurant
reviews.text: They have Direct TV with old TV sets, with plenty of channels to choose from.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room had a balcony looking towards a very nice looking courtyard.
reviews.title: Nice retreat on the water with beautiful view.

reviews.text: The breakfast buffet which was included in our package, but was pretty good. What you would normally get at a Comfort Inn or a La Quinta in the states.
reviews.title: On the shore

reviews.text: We had the Saturday dinner show included and it's very funny but it's in Spanish; so, if you are not Spanish speaker, you might get bored though I have to say that they have a very nice band playing there, and if you like to dance latin music, you'll enjoy it a lot. The food at the dinner show is very basic but it works.
reviews.title: parador villa parguera/DONT GO/FIRE TRAP
